attributes.action: publicly acknowledge the obvious and undoubted fitness of Hayley Warner-Bradshaw.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long the Great British public have been deprived of this beauty. We propose that at every bus stop, train station, shopping mall and street corner, pretty much everywhere in fact, that there should be a full colour, life size card board cut-out of Hayley. To cheer us all up. It'll be good for national morale.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
